About us

It all started in 2010, when Chad Rap founded Top Removals, set to become one of the fastest growing highly reputable furniture removal companies in Victoria.

What started as a small team operating from the living room of a house, quickly expanded to a powerhouse of moving company talent. 20 removal specialists now ensure each and every Melbourne wide moving customer receives unrivaled efficient, safe and cheap moving services each and every move.

Following each move we receive glowing feedback resulting in repeat loyal customers who in turn recommend our moving services to their friends and colleagues. Our video reviews are an honest tribute to the hard-working front line removalists and the behind the scenes champions who help execute impeccable moves both local and interstate.

From our small home based company in 2010, we fast forward to 2018 where Top Removals continue to receive accolades for superior customer service, both within the removal company industry and Victoria in general, having expanded even beyond their initial dreams.

What makes us different?

We’re not going to lie. There are many moving companies based in Melbourne. Some are new and others have been around before our dream to start a Melbourne removal company even came to fruition.

The thing is, we believe we are a little bit different, and our quirky qualities set us apart from the crowd – in the best possible way. Firstly, we live and breathe moving. Between us we have decades of moving and packing expertise, we do what we love and love what we do.

No job is too small for us and we get a real kick out of serving our customers and playing a key role in removing the stress from an otherwise exciting life event.

Most importantly is our team. What a bunch of great people! We are everyday hardworking guys and girls who call Australia our home, just like you. Our team members have a can-do attitude, work together seamlessly and believe that the small touches matter. In fact we’re so friendly that we’ve won awards!

What to look for in a Melbourne moving company

Interstate Moving Experience

Ensure the company has knowledge and experience of interstate moving. Look for references from previous customers as evidence of safe and successful moving services from Melbourne to beyond.

Local moving Experience

Reliable moving company within Melbourne should have extensive knowledge of all the local streets, laneways and highways. Every city has its own eccentricities and Melbourne is no different. One way streets, low clearances and peak hour traffic will all have been considered if the moving company you chose is reputable.

Packing Expertise

If the daunting task of packing up your house is causing you distress, consider using a Melbourne removal company that includes packing in its services.

Not only will a reliable company ensure your belongings are packed with paramount safety in mind, but they will also become familiar with the boxes and load they are carrying for you and will be well planned ahead of the house move.

It makes good sense to allow an experienced company package your goods for maximum safety and convenience.

Office Moves

A Melbourne moving company who specialises in office moves will understand the sensitivity of the documents they are moving, as well as the disruption to business that moving can cause. They will ensure the move occurs as swiftly and as safely as possible.

The down time caused by ceasing business while you move operations to a new operation can cause great loss of revenue and disruption to clients. Chose a company that gets the job down swiftly with no loss of important documents.

Antique and Piano removal expertise

A reputable furniture removal company will be able to carefully and painstakingly move your large, valuable furniture pieces while appreciating both the financial and sentimental value of your treasures.

Moving a Grand Piano could end in a disastrous mess if experts are not in control of the task. By choosing a team with substantial experience moving heavy and fragile items, you can be assured that no harm will come to your irreplaceable items.

Insurance

It’s imperative that you chose a Melbourne mover that includes adequate insurance to protect you and your belongings. Of course an excellent local or interstate mover won’t have a need for insurance claims, but we all know that in life, accidents beyond your control can happen.

Packaging Materials

Without adequate packing materials, your possessions are at risk, before, during and after the move. A Top Removal company will be able to provide affordable and quality packing materials that will lovingly protect your breakable items and provide sturdy stacking during the move.

With so many other furniture removalists to choose from, why choose Top Removals?

Our main point of difference from all our competitors, is that we care about moving people and we care about customer satisfaction. A happy customer is one who will tell his or her friends about us and will help us prove that we are the best that money can get. We have extensive industry experience, advanced equipment and materials, and our hard working and experienced staff will pay special attention to the little details, making sure that your valued belongings are cared for at all times.

On top of that, we offer a simple, straight forward and professional service at an affordable price, with no hidden fees. We also offer public liability and transit insurance (inclusive in our price), assuring full satisfaction and peace of mind.
